biotools.summary: Hydrophobicity Grapher graphs the hydrophobicity/hydrophilicity of a sequence of amino acids, using a sliding window. The window size can be specified by the user, and several hydrophobicity scales can be used to determine the plot.

bioschemas.name: Hydrophobicity
bioschemas.summary: Hydrophobicity Grapher graphs the hydrophobicity/hydrophilicity of a sequence of amino acids, using a sliding window. The window size can be specified by the user, and several hydrophobicity scales can be used to determine the plot.
